docs.title: 🧐 About
docs.text: I made this repo as I usually make one of scripts on different computers and wanted a central location to put theses and instead of emailing or sending in an PM. Thus, I made this repo to host all my scripts that, don't I don't think need to go into my org repos.

docs.title: Import OVA
docs.text:
• Import Virtual Appliance into Proxmox 
    # Pull Script

curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jershbytes/scripts/main/proxmox/import-ova.sh

# Run Script
./import-ova.sh
